snippet: The poll in Jefferson County has become a proxy battle between union supporters and conservative groups, with big money pouring in, and tensions rising, on both sides.
abstract: School board recall vote in Jefferson County, Colo, is heavily funded proxy war between conservative groups and teachers' union supporters over raft of education measures supported by conservatives, including charter schools and performance-based pay; election will be indication of whether voters in battleground state in election year are comfortable with rightward lean in education policy since board was elected in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The poll in Jefferson County has become a proxy battle between union supporters and conservative groups, with big money pouring in, and tensions rising, on both sides.

headline.print_headline: Recall Vote in Colorado Puts Conservative Education Overhaul to Test
headline.main: School Board Recall Vote in Colorado Tests Conservative Policies
